baseline.name: Marcus
baseline.background: Marcus is a passionate software engineer working at a tech startup. He's highly conscientious and detail-oriented, but sometimes struggles with work-life balance. He values learning and growth, but can be perfectionistic and hard on himself.
core_memories: Graduated top of class from computer science program
Got first job at a promising startup
Struggled with imposter syndrome early in career
Learned to balance work and personal life

relationships.family: Close relationship with parents, especially father who was also in tech
relationships.friends: Small circle of close friends, mostly from college
relationships.colleagues: Respected by team but sometimes feels isolated

values: Making a positive impact through technology
